sense.gloss: looking for something, searching for something

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑慌↑↓あわ↓てて|↑探↑↓さが↓し↑物|↑↓もの↓に↑本腰↑↓ほんごし↓を↑入↑↓い↓れ↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: I hurriedly started searching in earnest.

sdata.j: |↑探↑↓さが↓し↑物|↑↓もの↓は↑見↑↓み↓つかった？
sdata.e: Did you find what you were looking for?

sdata.j: トムは|↑探↑↓さが↓し↑物|↑↓もの↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけることができた？
sdata.e: Was Tom able to find what he was looking for?

sdata.j: メアリーは|↑探↑↓さが↓し↑物|↑↓もの↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけることができた？
sdata.e: Did Mary find what she was looking for?

sdata.j: |↑探↑↓さが↓し↑物|↑↓もの↓はこれじゃないです？
sdata.e: I assume this is what you're looking for.
